column5: Hey Guys I need some advice on the correct way to replace rivets on my boat. Its my first time so im not to sure how to replace them. So my question is Would the washer end be at the bottom of the boat or on the inside?. Thanks In Advance..
If you can access both sides... then those aren't the rivets to be using !
Take it to a marina/boat dealer!
Wrong rivets, like Irish said. Get it done professionally.

I have nothing wrong with the second rivet from the left...it's a sealed tank rivet. But if you can access both sides do it right and use solid rivets.. not pull rivets. Driving/bucking rivets isn't a mystical science..... heck even I can do it !
Thanks For all the advice guys.. We did use that seal tank rivet and did 200 of them today.
